events.name: Cosmology & Maths in Art (1G): Islamic Geometric Design
events.description:
LIMITED KITS: Following the success of National Design Week, we will be doing another run of this unique design & craft masterclass to bring art, science & faith into dialogue ♥ https://cosmologyandmathsinart.peatix.com

Announcing the "COSMOLOGY & MATHS IN ART: A Hands-On Exploration into Islamic Geometric Design". Learn to create your own intricate patterns or recreate classic examples. No prior experience needed.

Regardless of your faith, it is an experience to better appreciate history, diversity and the sciences while at the same time creating your own masterpiece to bring timeless beauty into your own home 🏡 

Sign up: https://cosmologyandmathsinart.peatix.com

#BuildersOfPeace #ArtScience
events.location: National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, Singapore 188969

events.name: HackerspaceSG's Xmas Party!
events.description:
It seems like we're going to do an Xmas party this year!

Here's the deal — we're having an open house/potluck. BYO food, BYO drinks/booze.

Some of us might be pooling money together to buy the usual Christmassy meat, ham and wine. If you're feeling lazy, let us know that you'd like to chip some money to the pot (suggested contribution: $30 to $50), and we'll settle the noms.

As usual, we'll probably be playing funny videos, nerf guns, and games like Cards Against Humanity. Other board/card/party games are welcome too!

Confirmed food:

🐄 4.6kg of beef brisket with chimichurri sauce (Kim Yong, Valentine, Benji, Alarice)
🍖 Bone-in Virginia ham
🐖 Pork knuckle
🐑 Shepherd's pie (Clara)
🍞 Sweet corn bread (Alarice)
🌾 Christmassy cous cous (Alarice)
🌽 Tacos (Andrew)
🍟 Some form of potatoes
🥗 Salad (Alisha)
🍰 Cheesecake (Alisha)
🧀 Random selection of the usual cheese

🎩 Hat tip to Jörg, Aloysius, Hong Phuc, Ivan, Huiren, Kim Yong, Roland, Björn, Michael+Engineers.SG for their pledge and support!

FAQ

1) Is this open to members only?

Nope, this party is open to everyone in the tech community. Just don't be annoying or make anyone feel unsafe.

(Santa may or may not show up this year. You'll have to believe to find out!)
events.location: HackerspaceSG, 344B King George's Avenue, King George's Building, Singapore 208576
